import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { Card, Col, ListGroup, Row } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet-async'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import { Store } from '../Store'; export default function PlaceOrderScreen() { const { state, dispatch: ctxDispatch } = useContext(Store); const { cart, userInfo } = state; return
Order Preview
